title: Practice Challenge
description: Apply what you've learned in this interactive coding challenge.
instructions:
Create a personalized greeting card using **String Interpolation** ($).

1. Define a variable for your name: `string name = "[Your Name]";`
2. Display a greeting using that variable: `Hello, {name}!`
3. Display the number of lessons: `You have completed {5} lessons!`

**Requirement**: Use the `$` syntax to insert the variables/values.

hints.text: Start your string with `$` before the quotes: `$"Like this"`.
Put your text inside the quotes, and variables inside `{}`.
Don't use `+`! The goal is to use the modern syntax.

commonMistakes.consequence: The code will print {variable} literally instead of the value.
commonMistakes.correction: Add a `$` before the opening quote.

commonMistakes.consequence: It works, but it's not the modern way we are practicing.
